com.invaders.rowlogic

Class AbstractEnemyRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invaders.rowlogic.AbstractEnemyRow
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicRow, ClassARow, ClassBRow, ClassCRow, ClassDRow, ClassERow

    public abstract class AbstractEnemyRow
extends java.lang.Object
    Clase abstracta que contiene toda la lógica para cada hilera de enemigos
    Author:
    jorte
